text: Somewhere on your blog template (probably in the Blog Listings Section), you'll find an `{% if topic %}` section (see here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/blog-content-markup#if-topic-statement>) that probably has a `|title` filter on it (see here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-filters#title>) which you can remove.
Hey Jon, *if* a WordPress solution would work for you talk to Samantha at Inbound Addons: <https://inboundaddons.com/inbound-member/>
